description: This file contains Python code that creates and manages user memories using an Agent, including defining memories from text or message history, and retrieving them.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Represents a message with a role and content, used for message history.

methods.name: create_user_memories
methods.description: Creates user memories from a text or list of messages for a specified user ID.

methods.name: get_user_memories
methods.description: Retrieves stored memories for a specified user ID.
